childMdx.excerpt: Act like an empty field, a moment made up by imaginal points, carriers of this presence, all part of a fluid praise from nothing to nothing…
My life has left me for love of You. Just one letter remains.   No state. No station. No way  beyond  here.   Nothing higher. Nothing lower…
This moment is a rout and will leave you standing at the goalposts declaring total  surrender , obvious  defeat in the face of perpetual…
